articles.description: The device which measures blood oxygenation can be a lifesaver for patients who test positive for coronavirus
articles.content: Until recently, unless you worked in healthcare, youd probably never heard of a pulse oximeter. But on Sunday, emergency physician Richard Levitan made a compelling case for owning one in a New York Times op-ed, writing that all persons with cough, fatigue an… [+3007 chars]

articles.title: Survey: How Big Is The Contact Tracing Workforce In US States? : Shots - Health News - NPR
articles.description: To safely reopen without risking new COVID-19 outbreaks, states need enough staff to do the crucial work of contact tracing. We surveyed public health agencies to find out how much they have.
articles.content: States are eager to open up and get people back to work, but how do they do that without risking new coronavirus flare ups? Public health leaders widely agree that communities need to ramp up capacity to test, trace and isolate. The idea behind this public he… [+9762 chars]

articles.title: Cedar Rapids man in custody after high speed chase early Tuesday morning - KCRG
articles.description: A Cedar Rapids man is in custody on multiple charges, after he led a Linn County Sheriff's Deputy on a brief chase early Tuesday morning.
articles.content:
CEDAR RAPIDS, Iowa (KCRG) - A Cedar Rapids man is in custody on multiple charges after he led a Linn County Sheriff's Deputy on a brief chase early Tuesday morning.
